Hi! I'm Deb.

and I'm a designer.

A sensitive soul with an expressive nature that believes Inspiration is Art.

My name is Debashis Barman and I am a Freelance front end Web Designer. I try to make the websites I design and build as simple and intuitive to use as possible whilst still having a unique aesthetic appeal. I specialise in responsive front-end design, HTML/CSS and web typography.

When I'm free, I spend my time exploring places and beyond, adventuring in the wilderness, working on tiny side projects, writing, romancing my lovely girlfriend, sketching and doodling, reading short stories and novels, listening to music and playing games. And internet. I love internet.
